程序包 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rewrite

Apache Flume Appender.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    RewritePolicy
    Interface to be implemented by components that support modifications to the LogEvent.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    LoggerNameLevelRewritePolicy
    Rewrites log event levels for a given logger name.
    MapRewritePolicy
    This policy modifies events by replacing or possibly adding keys and values to the MapMessage.
    PropertiesRewritePolicy
    This policy modifies events by replacing or possibly adding keys and values to the MapMessage.
    RewriteAppender
    This Appender allows the logging event to be manipulated before it is processed by other Appenders.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    MapRewritePolicy.Mode
    An enumeration to identify whether keys not in the MapMessage should be added or whether only existing keys should be updated.

程序包org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rewrite的说明

Apache Flume Appender. Requires the user specifically include Flume and its dependencies.
